Description:
Detects the creation of a named file stream with the imphash of a well-known hack tool

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool Named File Stream Created
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (hash like '%imphash=bcca3c247b619dcd13c8cdff5f123932%' or hash like '%imphash=3a19059bd7688cb88e70005f18efc439%' or hash like '%imphash=bf6223a49e45d99094406777eb6004ba%' or hash like '%imphash=0c106686a31bfe2ba931ae1cf6e9dbc6%' or hash like '%imphash=0d1447d4b3259b3c2a1d4cfb7ece13c3%' or hash like
